data.text: @TrueNorthCentre Has somebody organized a legal defense fund for these guys? The NDP are a bunch of idiots. We need to remove them from power and British Columbia as soon as possible
@calebbauman @TrueNorthCentre Ha ha sure but shit flows downhill and they all should be jailed! Of coarse BC is last to the awakening! Oh wait we’re still following the science!!
@TrueNorthCentre And yet people wonder why they’re still protesting?

@TrueNorthCentre They tell us to follow the science yet they ignore natural immunity. They are treating this like TWD series, all are infected but you 1st need to be bitten, Everyone is a carrier of C-19 but you only show signs if you get vaxxed and still get a "new variant". Where's the logic?.
@PoliticalZaatar @TrueNorthCentre There's no emergency.  If there is, then the vaccines suck and there shouldnt be mandates.
@TrueNorthCentre Forcing a gym to close...for health reasons??? Something smells really bad here
